description: TSP8 racing formula that makes it perfect in conditions on both sides of the freezing point. When ironing, take approx. 8-10 sec. to cover your ski base. It's important to have a good iron to get an efficient melting of the powder. TSP8 can be used as a race powder alone, but is often used as a base for top coats.
name: TSP8 Powder, -4C to 4C, 40g - Red
